name: convex
title: Convex
description: This extension will allow the user to ask about documents, open convex panel, use convex panel, and more.
author: robertalv

commands.name: switch-convex-project
commands.title: Switch Convex Project
commands.subtitle: Convex
commands.description: Search and find your Convex projects across teams

commands.name: run-convex-function
commands.title: Run Convex Function
commands.subtitle: Convex
commands.description: Search and run Convex queries, mutations, and actions

commands.name: browse-convex-tables
commands.title: Browse Convex Tables
commands.subtitle: Convex
commands.description: Browse and search documents in your Convex tables

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
